Key Match Events: Jose Altuve left the game against the New York Yankees after one inning due to a bruised left leg
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dusty Baker said Altuve fouled a ball off his shin in his first at-bat and that he'd hit it on the same spot several times this week
Miscellaneous Highlights: Altuve has been on the injured list twice this season, missing about three weeks in July with an oblique injury and fracturing his left thumb in the World Baseball Classic
Others: Altuve is batting.312 with 10 homers and 34 RBIs this season, and completed the ninth cycle in franchise history Monday night
